mapper.select: SELECT * FROM test_content order by num desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_content (writer, title, content, regtime, hits, user_id) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 0, #{user_id})
mapper.update: update test_content set hits = #{hits} where num = #{num}
